title: Monster in the Shadows
description: How do you stop someone who has nothing to lose?Watching the life leave a man’s eyes is the highlight of my day.Monsters aren’t born; they’re made. And in the dark is where I thrive.Nothing ever stands in the way of finishing a job. Until Paige. She’s pure, innocent, and everything I should stay away from.But I can’t stay away. She’s mine. And I will have her, no matter what.Can I stay focused and finish this job, or will I be taken down by the one thing I thought I wasn’t capable of: love?Monster In The Shadows is a dark romance stand alone.If you like dangerous men, strong, and determined women, and twist and turns you won't see coming than this book is for you!Scroll up and one click today!TRIGGER WARNING This book is centred in a dark world, and there will be triggers. If you are a sensitive reader this book may not be for you.
author: Laura   John
